attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️✨no✨🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and every time I open it, my pet turtle would make me go take it on a walk on Saturn and it’s slowly wasting my money on buying water for my train over there. I need someone to fix it ASAP!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!
attributes.review: By far the WORST app I’ve ever downloaded in my life. Full of nonsense. So many bug issues. Caused my phone to freeze. Started getting spam emails and now a virus sent to my email address. Would not recommend. Garbage🗑

attributes.title: Spooky!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I heard it had the funniest jokes, but the joke was on me.... ever since downloading it I’ve been having nightmares that an oompa loompa was running our country and that the year was 1920... crazy right?

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: This app is literally the worst app to ever exist! While I was walking home from school I got a notification and then the theif walked inside my kitchen! My pet goldfish was walking my dog when all the sudden  the fish stared talking and the dog was flying into the restroom!

attributes.title: DISGRACE ✨🧚🏼U R GONNA LET THIS CHETTO PUFF BE PRESIDENT OH HELL NAW NOT MY PRESIDENT 😘
attributes.review: Please delete this app I am very disappointed to say that this is the president. This app only promotes himself and not other causes that are more important right now. If he was a good president he wouldn’t be worried about winning. This app is very unnecessary and frustrating to see.

attributes.title: DON’T INSTALL, HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app looks like it’s being designed by a child, my iphone kept glitching and stopped working even after closing and reopening the app. I do not recommend this app to anyone, absolutely horrible.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app but later found out that it will try to steal your pet refrigerator, kangaroo, dolphin, dinosaur, and worst of all your pet MATTRESS. An absolute abomination to the United States. The person this app is intended for is a dried up banana peel and a disgrace to humanity. Thank you for your time❤️❤️

attributes.title: Not helpful
attributes.review: I thought this app would give me helpful news, but it didn’t. Also every time I’m on it for more than 10 minutes, it crashes.

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: Right after I downloaded this app, i just had to delete it. Unfortunately there is no way to see a good aspect to this app. I do not recommend downloading this app

attributes.title: WORST APPP
attributes.review: I opened it to see my phone glitching out almost as if I downloaded iOS 14 with a website🤪✨ I opened it and the Cheeto was in my microwave busting out of it he got me with a hammer and gave me a concussion he walked out like he owned the place he hacked my fridge and my dog😤
